subject: Re: wrt inotify problem
body:
On Tue, 2007-04-10 at 17:51 +0200, Volker Lendecke wrote:
> On Tue, Apr 10, 2007 at 11:46:02AM -0400, simo wrote:
> > > What error message do we get from which syscall?
> > 
> > Not sure, AVC messages are terse and don't give much information
> > unfortunately. I will try to gdb it and see if I can get something.
> 
> strace does not work with selinux?

I think there is no problem with strace and SELinux, but the log were
clear on where the problem was so I got directly the gdb route :)

Simo.

-- 
Simo Sorce
